title: 147. Angela Meyer: Joan Smokes
itunes:author: Words and Nerds: Authors, books and literature.
itunes:summary:
Melbourne-based author, publisher, professional reader, whisky-drinker.

Her debut novel, A Superior Spectre, is published by Peter Bishop Books (Ventura) in Australia and Saraband in the UK. It has been shortlisted for five literary awards. You can read more about A Superior Spectre and buy it here.

Angela recently won the inaugural Mslexia (UK) Novella Competition for Joan Smokes and that will be available in ebook and print in December 2019. More soon!

description:
Melbourne-based author, publisher, professional reader, whisky-drinker.

Her debut novel, A Superior Spectre, is published by Peter Bishop Books (Ventura) in Australia and Saraband in the UK. It has been shortlisted for five literary awards. You can read more about A Superior Spectre and buy it here.

Angela recently won the inaugural Mslexia (UK) Novella Competition for Joan Smokes and that will be available in ebook and print in December 2019. More soon!
